alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 3:01PM CDT until August 29 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Christian County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nixa, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nixa... Ozark... Fremont Hills... Boaz... Linden... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
